about.title: About EduGameHQ
about.subtitle: Where Learning Meets Fun - Transforming Education Through Interactive Gaming
about.company_subtitle: Making quality education accessible, engaging, and enjoyable for every child

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To democratize quality education by providing free, engaging, and effective educational games that inspire curiosity, foster creativity, and build essential skills for the 21st century.
mission.vision_description: A world where every child has access to high-quality educational content that makes learning joyful, meaningful, and transformative.

quality_first.title: Quality First
quality_first.description: Every game is carefully curated and tested by education experts

always_free.title: Always Free
always_free.description: Education should be accessible to everyone, everywhere

safe_environment.title: Safe Environment
safe_environment.description: Child-friendly content with strict safety and privacy standards

global_reach.title: Global Reach
global_reach.description: Supporting learners worldwide with multilingual content

beginning.title: The Beginning
beginning.description: EduGameHQ was born from a simple observation: children learn best when they're having fun. Founded in 2023 by a team of educators, game developers, and child psychologists, we set out to bridge the gap between entertainment and education.

growth.title: Growth & Expansion
growth.description: What started as a small collection of math games has grown into a comprehensive platform serving over 50,000 students worldwide. Our games cover mathematics, science, coding, language arts, and critical thinking skills.

today.title: Today & Beyond
today.description: Today, EduGameHQ continues to evolve, always guided by our core belief that quality education should be free, accessible, and enjoyable for every child.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.intro: Our diverse team of educators, developers, and researchers work together to create the best possible learning experience for students worldwide.

sarah_chen.name: Dr. Sarah Chen
sarah_chen.description: Former Stanford professor with 15+ years in educational technology

mike_rodriguez.name: Mike Rodriguez
mike_rodriguez.description: Award-winning game designer specializing in educational content

lisa_wang.name: Lisa Wang
lisa_wang.description: Expert in child development and learning psychology

alex_thompson.name: Alex Thompson
alex_thompson.description: Full-stack developer passionate about accessible education

contact_cta.description: We'd love to hear from you! Contact us for partnerships, feedback, or just to say hello.

cross_platform.description: Works on any device - desktop, tablet, or mobile

no_downloads.description: Instant play in your browser - no installation required

how_it_works.title: How EduGameHQ Works
how_it_works.description: Simple steps to start your learning adventure

step1.title: 1. Explore Games
step1.description: Browse by category, age, or subject to find your perfect game.

step2.title: 2. Choose & Play
step2.description: Select any game you like and start playing instantly in your browser.

step3.title: 3. Learn & Grow
step3.description: Enjoy fun gameplay that reinforces key academic concepts.

seo.title: Terms of Service | EduGameHQ - Educational Gaming Platform
seo.description: Read our terms of service for EduGameHQ educational gaming platform. Safe, educational, and fun games for children aged 6-18.
seo.keywords: terms of service, educational games, platform rules, user agreement, child safety

header.title: Terms of Service
header.subtitle: Clear guidelines for using our educational gaming platform safely and responsibly

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using EduGameHQ.com ('the Service'), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

service_description.title: Description of Service
service_description.content: EduGameHQ.com is a free educational gaming platform that provides access to educational games for children aged 6-18. Our service includes:

age_requirements.title: Age Requirements
items: Our service is designed for children aged 6-18
Children under 13 should use this service with parental supervision
We do not require account registration

parental_consent.title: Parental Consent
parental_consent.content: For users under 13, we recommend parental supervision and consent before using our service.

permitted.title: Permitted Uses
items: Sharing with family and friends for educational purposes
Use in classroom settings with proper supervision

prohibited.title: Prohibited Uses
items: Attempting to hack or disrupt the service
Using the service for any illegal activities

third_party_content.title: Third-Party Content
third_party_content.content: Our platform includes games and content from third-party providers:
items: We do not own all games displayed on our platform
Third-party games are subject to their own terms and conditions
We strive to ensure all content is appropriate for children
We are not responsible for third-party content or services

our_content.title: Our Content
our_content.content: The EduGameHQ website design, layout, and original content are protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws.

third_party.title: Third-Party Content
third_party.content: All games and third-party content remain the property of their respective owners. We display this content under fair use or with permission.

privacy_data.title: Privacy and Data Protection
privacy_data.content: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your information.
items: We do not collect personal information from children
Game progress is stored locally on your device
We use minimal cookies for functionality
We comply with COPPA and GDPR requirements
privacy_data.note: For complete details, please read our Privacy Policy.

educational_value.title: Educational Value
educational_value.content: While we strive to provide educational content, we make no guarantees about specific learning outcomes or educational effectiveness.

service_availability.title: Service Availability
service_availability.content: We provide our service 'as is' and make no warranties about:

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: To the fullest extent permitted by law:
items: We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages
Our total liability shall not exceed the amount you paid to use our service (which is $0 for free users)
We are not responsible for third-party content or services
Parents are responsible for supervising their children's use of our service

advertising.title: Advertising
advertising.content: Our service is supported by advertising:
items: Ads are non-personalized for children's content
We use Google AdSense and other advertising partners
Ad content is subject to our content policies

modifications.title: Modifications to Service
items: Modify or discontinue any part of our service

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend access to our service immediately, without prior notice, for conduct that we believe violates these Terms of Service or is harmful to other users, us, or third parties.

governing_law.title: Governing Law
governing_law.content: These Terms shall be interpreted and governed by the laws of the jurisdiction where our service is operated, without regard to conflict of law provisions.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to update these Terms of Service at any time. We will notify users of any material changes by posting the new Terms of Service on this page with an updated 'Last updated' date.
changes.note: Your continued use of the service after any such changes constitutes your acceptance of the new Terms of Service.

cta.title: Questions About Our Terms?
cta.description: Need clarification on any of our terms? We're here to help!

observe.title: Observe Everything
observe.description: Pay attention to the world around you and ask "why" and "how"

experiment.title: Experiment Safely
experiment.description: Test your hypotheses through controlled experiments and observations

journal.title: Keep a Science Journal

connect.description: Link scientific concepts to everyday events and experiences

seo.title: Privacy Policy | EduGameHQ - Protecting Your Privacy
seo.description: Learn how EduGameHQ protects your privacy and keeps children safe online. COPPA and GDPR compliant educational gaming platform.
seo.keywords: privacy policy, child safety, COPPA compliance, data protection, educational games privacy

privacy_policy_page.page_description: Your privacy and safety are our top priorities. Learn how we protect children's information and comply with international privacy laws.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: EduGameHQ.com is committed to protecting the privacy of our users, especially children. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect information when you visit our educational gaming platform.

may_collect_items.label: Game Progress
may_collect_items.detail: Stored locally on your device only

may_collect_items.label: Anonymous Usage Data
may_collect_items.detail: Which games are played (no personal identification)

may_collect_items.label: Technical Information
may_collect_items.detail: Browser type, device type for optimization

information_use.title: How We Use Information
items: Improve our educational games and website
Ensure games work properly on different devices

cookies_storage.title: Cookies and Local Storage
cookies_storage.content: We use minimal cookies and local storage to enhance your experience:
items: Remember your game progress (stored on your device only)
cookies_storage.note: You can disable cookies in your browser settings, but some features may not work properly.

third_party.title: Third-Party Services
third_party.game_providers_content: Our games are embedded from trusted educational platforms. Each game provider has their own privacy policy.
third_party.adsense_content: We use Google AdSense to display advertisements. For children's content:
adsense_items: Ads are family-friendly and appropriate for children
No personal data is used for ad targeting

coppa_compliance.title: Children's Privacy (COPPA Compliance)
coppa_compliance.content: We are committed to complying with the Children's Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA):
items: We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13
We do not require registration or account creation
All content is designed to be safe for children
Parents can contact us with any concerns

data_security.title: Data Security
data_security.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect any information we collect:
items: HTTPS encryption for all website traffic

international_users.title: International Users
international_users.content: For users in the European Union, we comply with GDPR requirements:

policy_changes.title: Changes to This Policy
policy_changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify users of any significant changes by posting the new policy on this page with an updated 'Last updated' date.

contact_us.title: Contact Us
contact_us.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us:
contact_us.note: For Parents: If you believe your child has provided personal information to us, please contact us immediately so we can remove it.
